704534f-a.title: Brooklyn: Fulton Street - Portland Avenue
704534f-a.text:
Fulton Street, at the N. E. corner of South Portland Avenue, seen from underneath the B. M. T. Fulton Street "E).' The houses on the left are on South Portland Avenue.
June 15, 1940
P. L. Sperr
704534f-a.folder: Fulton Street & Portland Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

706831f-a.title: Brooklyn: Portland Avenue S.) - Fulton Street
706831f-a.text:
South Portland Ave., n.e. cor. A Fulton St., B'klyn.
May 13, 192
P.L. Sperr, photographer
Neg.~ eT
706831f-a.folder: Portland Avenue S.) & Fulton Street, Brooklyn, NY
